tha-ap3:9.4: sobhayanti → sobhayantā (s2, s3, mr) | patāyanti sobhayantā (pts1)
tha-ap3:26.3: Pammakā → pampakā (bj, c1) | campakā (s2, s3) | sampakā (pts1) | cammakā (mr)
tha-ap3:28.2: camarā gaṇḍakā bahū → vakā bheraṇḍakā bahū (bj, s2, s3) | vakabheraṇḍakā bahū (pts1)
tha-ap3:28.3: sukapotā → suggapotā (bj, pts1) | puggapotā (si) | suttapotā (s2, s3)
tha-ap3:31.2: madhuke → madhukā (bj, s2, s3, c1) | madhuke (pts1), kāsumāriyo → kāsamāriyo (s2, s3) | sumāriyo (pts1)
tha-ap3:32.1: Kosambā → kosumbhā (bj, s2, s3, pts1), saḷalā nimbā → salalā nīpā (bj) | salaḷā nīpā (s2, s3) | saḷalā nīpā (pts1) | panasā ambā (?)
tha-ap3:50.2: pubbavidehakaṃ → pubbavidehanaṃ (si, s2, s3, pts1, mr)
tha-ap3:87.2: pathavī cākhilājaṭaṃ → paṭhaviṃ cākhilaṃ jahe (bj) | paṭhaviñcākhilañjahe (s2, s3) | paṭhaviṃ cākhilañjahe (pts1)
tha-ap3:114.1: Pacchime bhavasampatte → pacchimabhave sampatte (bj) | pacchimebhave sampatte (pts1)
tha-ap3:135.1: Attakāramayaṃ etaṃ → atthakāmaṃ mamaṃ etaṃ (si) | atthakāmaṃ mamametaṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | atthakāramayaṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:154.2: Paccabyatha → paccabyathā (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | paccabyattha (^pi-tv-kd1#220 [Mahākhandhaka/ Sāriputtamoggallānapabbajjākathā], ^pi-tv-kd1#227 [Mahākhandhaka/ Sāriputtamoggallānapabbajjākathā])
tha-ap3:159.3: Dantova dantadamatho → dantova dantadamathe (bj, s2, s3) | dantovuttamadamathe (si) | dantoca uttamadamathe (pts1)
tha-ap3:160.3: adhigacchesi → adhigacchāhi (bj) | adhigacchasi (si) | adhigacchehi (s2, s3, pts1) | adhigatosi (?)
tha-ap3:187.3: Sabbā velaṃva phusanti → sabbāva velaṃ phusanti (bj) | sabbavelaṃ paphussanti (s2, s3) | sabbavelam paphusanti (pts1)
tha-ap3:201.3: Catuddisānuviloketvā → catuddisā viloketvā (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | catuddisānuloketvā (mr)
tha-ap3:208.3: vicinantā → vicintentā (bj) | vicintenti (s2, s3, pts1) | vicinantaṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:211.3: na sakkeyyuṃ → na kappeyyuṃ (s2, s3) | na pappeyyum (pts1) | na pappeyyuṃ (mr)
tha-ap3:216.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (bj, mr) | jhāpayiṃ mama (si) | jhāpayiṃ mamaṃ (s2, s3) | jhāpayī mamaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap3:225.1: Samāpattīnaṃ kusalo → samāpattinayakusalo (bj) | samāpattivinayakusalo (si, pts1) | samāpattimhi kusalo (s2, s3)
tha-ap3:226.1: Sāvakaguṇenapi phussena → sāvakaguṇenāpi phussena (bj) | sāvakaguṇenāpi phusena (si, pts1) | sāvakaguṇaphussena (s2, s3)
tha-ap3:226.2: parisuttamabhāravā → purisuttamagāravā (si, s2, s3, pts1) | purisuttamabhāravā (mr)
tha-ap3:228.2: vasumatīpi → vasumatī (bj, mr) | vasu patīnaṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
